alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MASON, ROBERTSON, BRACKEN, SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHERN BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 312 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located in Bracken and Mason counties, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Georgetown, Washington, Ripley, Aberdeen, Augusta, Brooksville, Russellville, Dover, Higginsport, Germantown, Murphysville, Stonewall, Powersville, Feesburg, Johnsville, South Ripley, Utopia, Chatham and Tuckahoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
